section.heading: Prosecutions.
section.text: All prosecutions for violations of this chapter shall be in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia by the Attorney General for the District of Columbia or any of his assistants.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: renumbered as § 5, Sept. 26, 1984, D.C. Law 5-113, § 401, 31 DCR 3974

annoGroup.heading: Cross References
annoGroup.annotation: Criminal procedure, conduct of prosecutions, see § 23-101.

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 15-354 substituted “Attorney General for the District of Columbia” for “Corporation Counsel”.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Mayor authorized to issue rules: See notes to § 47-2601.
